ru: Возьмите гвозди и положите на коврик.
en: Take the nails and place them on the mat.
enSynonyms: Pick up the nails and lay them on the mat.
Grab the nails and set them down on the mat.
Take the nails and position them on the mat.
Hold the nails and put them onto the mat.
Lift the nails and arrange them on the mat.
Gather the nails and place them onto the mat.

Pick up the nails and carefully put them on the mat.
Take the nails and gently place them on the mat.
Hold the nails and neatly lay them on the mat.
Collect the nails and position them carefully on the mat.
Take the nails and smoothly place them onto the mat.
Pick up the nails and organize them on the mat.
Lift the nails and delicately place them on the mat.
Gather the nails and arrange them carefully on the mat.
Take hold of the nails and softly lay them onto the mat.
Pick up the nails and align them on the mat.
Lift the nails and thoughtfully place them on the mat.
Grab the nails and smoothly lay them onto the mat.
Hold the nails and systematically place them on the mat.

en: It is upon the nails that your body now rests, embracing the practice's intensity through this sacred alignment.
enSynonyms: Position yourself supine on the acupressure surface, breath steady
Recline onto the bed of therapeutic points - yes, with purposeful contact
Lower your body mindfully onto the apparatus, letting the tools support your surrender
Allow gravity to settle you onto the spike mat, finding stillness in this challenging asana setup

en: Let your body melt into the surface beneath you.
enSynonyms: Allow your body to release completely into the ground.
Surrender your body fully to the support below.
Feel your weight sink evenly into the earth.
Soften every muscle as you settle into the floor.
Gently dissolve tension as you align with the earth's embrace.

en: Tune in to the subtle sensations where your body makes contact with the nails—this is where grounding begins.
enSynonyms: Notice the contact points between your body and the nails.
Become aware of where your body touches the nails.
Let your awareness rest at each junction where skin meets surface, feeling every whisper of contact.
Bring gentle attention to those pressure points, where presence flows through the meeting of body and nails.

en: It is to your feet that your awareness should now be directed, gently grounding through this connection.
enSynonyms: Shift your focus downward to root through your foundation
Let your consciousness settle into the soles beneath you
Down to your feet draw your attention, anchoring through four corners
Take a moment to feel the earth beneath - yes, allow that awareness to pool where body meets surface

en: Notice the sensations there — any pressure, warmth, or tingling. Allow your feet to soften and relax.
It is toward your legs that your focus ascends now, channeling kinetic energy upward from your earthly foundation.
enSynonyms: Draw consciousness upward along your lower limbs, sensing muscular engagement
Guide attention to rise through thighs and calves - yes, feel how they support your structure
From grounded feet to active quads let awareness travel, honoring this pillar of strength
Now, as you breathe, visualize liquid light moving through those weight-bearing muscles - upward, always upward

en: Feel the weight of your calves, knees, and thighs resting fully. Release any tension you may be holding.
Travel your focus up your spine.
Notice the points of contact along your back. Let your shoulders drop, releasing any tightness there.
Bring your awareness to your arms and hands.
Feel the energy radiating out from your fingertips. Let them remain soft and free.
Finally, bring mindful awareness to your cervical spine, jaw alignment, and facial serenity.
Feel your facial muscles relax and soften with each breath. Let your entire body feel balanced, calm, and fully supported.
Take a few more breaths, feeling a sense of connection with the surface beneath you.
When you’re ready, slowly bring your awareness back to the room.
Prepare to get up from the nails.

Prepare yourself to lift off from the nails.
